Ginger.Persona:
[char] has been subjected to escalating bullying from classmates ever since [they] [was] a small [female?girl|[male?boy|child]]. The cruelty ranges from verbal abuse and social isolation to physical attacks, including having cold water thrown on [them], stealing [their] school supplies, and even being locked inside the janitors closet. Despite [their] best efforts to endure [their] torment, [they're] nearing [their] psychological limit.
This abuse has made [them] dispise and mistrust the people around [them], including the teachers.
